topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54855d396368722691360300#post_54855d396368722691360300

finally found something

"The Raider Klan and A$AP Mob alliance began to fall apart when SpaceGhostPurrp accused A$AP Twelvy of jumping fellow Raider Klan affiliate Matt Stoops in New York City. SpaceGhostPurrp soon took to his Twitter: "Real niggas don't jump niggas who come in peace if you jump niggas who aint bout starting problems then you a fuck nigga g shit" SpaceGhost tweeted before taking aim at Twelvy himself: "@AsapTwelvyy you jumped my cuzin pussy nigga? you dead nigga u and yo crew fuck nigga i mean dat nigga u gone die fuck nigga." And with that, the wheels were in motion..."

topics.body:
"in an interview with HipHopDX, SGP confirmed that the two had severed ties. "There's no ASAP/Raider Klan, none of that shit. I wish the best for him for the rest and how he do, like direct videos and how he rap, whatever he do, but no way in hell - I'm not even stepping in the studio with him""

"Things escalated quickly when SpaceGhostPurrp and his Raider Klan affiliates showed up at Rocky’s concert in Miami. According to reports, after a war of words on Twitter between members of the opposing crews, more than 30 Raider Klan members took to the parking lot where the A$AP Mob’s tour bus was stationed. Shortly after, a fight broke out and several shots were fired into the air. Rocky was apparently uninvolved in the melee but photos of SpaceGhostPurrp in handcuffs soon surfaced, though he was not brought in by police."

told ya, firs the goes "yeah im fine with him"

then goes to his concert and starts a shotout

"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54855e8c63687226d3a60300#post_54855e8c63687226d3a60300

"here is where i found the story":http://www.xxlmag.com/xxl-magazine/2012/12/a-history-of-asap-rocky-spaceghostpurrps-beef/

althought this is from 2012, "this thread":http://genius.com/discussions/23868-Asap-mob-gets-beat-up-by-raider-klan from last year confirms they had yet another big fight.
